var a = function () {
	},
	b = function * () {
	},
	c = function simple () {
	},
	d = function * generator () {
	};
/**************************************************/
var a=function(){},b=function*(){},c=function simple(){},d=function*generator(){};
/**************************************************/
var a = function (  )
	{
	},
	b = function * (  )
	{
	},
	c = function simple (  )
	{
	},
	d = function * generator (  )
	{
	};
